feed.title: Posts tagged with apps: Dan Dart's Blog: Software, Mathematics, Radio, Music

entry.title: A * For That
entry.content: My goodness. First it was I'm a PC/Mac... obviously you're a bloody human.... since Apple said "there's an app for that", Subway of all companies have invented "There's a Sub for that"... Geez, talk about not being able to afford imaginative people... Oh, and I'm Spartacus.
